00009 /* DOC The two routines that follows enable to invoke sextractor
00010 and get the resulting catalog in a SEStarList. */
00011 
00012 /* DOCF Structures to get every parameters right before calling for SExtractor */
00013 class ForSExtractor{
00014 public:
00015 string FitsFileName ;
00016 string FitsMaskName ; 
00017 string FitsWeightName  ;
00018 string FitsBackName  ;
00019 string FitsMiniBackName ;
00020 double saturation  ;
00021 bool back_type_manual ; // if true, a constant value for the background is taken.
00022 double sigma_back ;
00023 double backmean ;
00024 public:
00025  ForSExtractor(){string vide ; FitsMaskName=vide;FitsWeightName=vide;FitsBackName=vide;
00026  FitsMiniBackName=vide; back_type_manual = false ;sigma_back=-1;backmean=0.;};
00027  void Print();
00028 };
00029 
00030 class AllForSExtractor: public ForSExtractor{
00031 
00032 public:
00033 string SexConfigFileName  ;
00034 string SexParamName  ; 
00035 string SexNNWName ;
00036 string SexFilterName ;
00037 public:
00038 AllForSExtractor(ForSExtractor const & data0) 
00039    : ForSExtractor(data0){string vide ; SexConfigFileName=vide ;
00040    SexParamName = vide ; SexNNWName = vide ;SexFilterName  = vide ;};
00041  void FillFromEnvironnement();
00042  void Print();
00043 };

00047 /* DOCF  make a SEStarList on an image, all parameters
00048 can be set by hand. Background sigma and value are recovered
00049 in the  Fond and SigmaFond variables. 
00050 Whether FitsMaskName is given or not, or is empyt or not,
00051 a mask is used to flag the objects.*/
00052 int  
00053 _SEStarListMake(AllForSExtractor const & data,
00054                SEStarList &List,  double & Fond, 
00055                double &SigmaFond,
00056                Image * pmask_sat);

00059 int
00060 SEStarListMake(const ForSExtractor & shortdata,
00061                SEStarList &List, double & Fond, 
00062                double &SigmaFond,
00063                Image * pmask_sat);
